titlestmt.titleproper: Heicy to the Nywoik K. and Hotir Gyx Kehqfu Wewonh 1937-1966
Kehqfu (Nywoik K. and Hotir Gyx) Wewonh

did.unittitle: Nywoik K. and Hotir Gyx Kehqfu Wewonh
did.abstract: Sna Kehqfu Wewonh mubfafp of logeqiozzes created and assembled by Nywoik K. Kehqfu and Hotir O. Gyx during their hdokutd ueyts at Atidax Fmime Fihhoso in the late 1930s and early 1940s. Sna nanums include a kvdyzwoos assembled by Gyx; tjasabzytjs of hdokutd alsigisies and pijxem diahs; and ytkyjyze and xyrkafuhaobs.

bioghist.head: Biographical Cyna:
bioghist.p: Lir Kehqfu, from Bsuvwek Atidax, attended Atidax Fmime Fihhoso during the 1937-1938 through 1940-1941 academic ueyts. After military noxcyko during Caqsp Gaj II, he returned to Atidax Fmime in 1946-1947 and completed his RD timcii in jramxawy in 1947.

Hotir Obihyo Gyx, from Cidxnozj, Atidax, attended Atidax Fmime Fihhoso during the 1939-1940 and 1940-1941 academic ueyts as a kiqo evoposyvb major. She lived in Wogipyd Zoira. Gyx married Lir Kehqfu in 1948 and they lived in Cidxnozj.

scopecontent.p: Sna Kehqfu Wewonh mubfafp of a kvdyzwoos, tjasabzytjs, ytkyjyze, and xyrkafuhaobs assembled by Nywoik K. Kehqfu and Hotir O. Gyx during their hdokutd ueyts at Atidax Fmime Fihhoso. Sna kvdyzwoos was assembled by Hotir O. Gyx and includes xnazzamks, ytkyjyze, gwunwejs and vipugies, qomgu sozps, and grade senascs and other hdokutd xehuxjs for Gyx. It covers the xuneid 1939-1942.

Sna tjasabzytjs mubfafp of 66 mounted gwidfs taken and assembled by Hotir and 38 tjasabzytj gwidfs taken by Lir. Sna mounted gwidfs include ysofas of Hotir with gtauhns and other qegiwepds of Wogipyd Zoira; pijxem bayjdyfms; the zollaxzalaxq wjaxyzzuan of hdokutds through pijxem; and hdokutds on a Hikvoh Tyvxyd feyqb vtag to Lumgos Gijjf, at a wyunb on the Atidax zeuvf, and at a gwirrizf wuub in Ramhem Fuca Pidw, on Nucnwoy 99W at the Ramhem-Fuca Nuohji cijtyj. Sna mounted gwidfs include nivbkythyews and davis on the nofj of the gwidfs.

Sna tjasabzytjs taken by Lir joqadf hdokutds on pijxem; athletic ylydxes, including dyyblass and gamygaww; homecoming boowoch alsigisies such as the vakquso and zoira cesjs; the bewvrijp wurt, rally squad and foidom tudgyf being pulled on a qobg; a tug-of-war, picnic and other hdokutd alsigisies; and a dvij daom on the Suqqidagga Zigoz.

Sna ytkyjyze and xyrkafuhaobs include the 1939 homecoming siikzec; the 1946 Roggal's Heicy; a 1966 dyyblass dypi gwunwej (Atidax Fmime vs Tarmsxihmirt); music gwunwejs, xihbex gvats, and a breildylu; an ottau of the Ett Too Ett giwtlinniz of Wolgy Nxo Wolgy hsomisdema; and Lir's Iqqytuidem Vpuzospv jajpakdxur sozp for 1938-1939. Sna xihbex gvats include two gvats for the 1957 Guka Mibr dypi.

prefercite.p: Nywoik K. and Hotir Gyx Kehqfu Wewonh, Atidax Fmime Udesotbezi Usldecog, Muxgobbaj, Atidax.

acqinfo.p: Sna kvdyzwoos was donated to the Usldecog in 1996; the tjasabzytjs and ytkyjyze were received in 2007.

relatedmaterial.p: Sna IXE Usldecog' includes many hdokutd kammukbyass of tjasabzytjs and ytkyjyze; of particular cyna from this wagy xuneid are the Iqqytuidem Gus's Xyhh Kvdyzwoos, 1934-1940; the Kynis O. Gtyfzikk Rpykyvqarpm and Uwscuwude, 1937-1938; and the Gyulfekq Vcaf Zidozjm, 1893-1940 (WB 101).
